'' he said. When asked whether he would consider joining the Obama administration, Colin Powell , 73, said he was not looking for a return to the White House, and that he prefers serving as someone the president calls up from time to time.

http://wn.com/Allen Iverson_Allen Iverson_19pts_vs_Nets_08/09_NBA_*Clutch_Plays Allen Iverson and Tayshaun Prince stepped up for the short-handed Detroit Pistons. Allen Iverson scored 19 points, and Tayshaun Prince added 16 to help the Pistons win their fifth straight game, 83-75 over the New Jersey Nets on Wednesday. When any team in the league loses three of their top six guys, things are going to change for them, Pistons coach Michael Bruce Curry said.`` Luckily, a lot of other guys stepped up.'' Detroit played without Richard Hamilton ( groin) and Antonio McDyess ( ribs), and lost Rasheed Wallace to a first-half foot injury, but

lead the pioneering technology company.`` We have been talking about how best to simplify our href="http://www.earthtimes.org/tag/management.html"> management structure and speed up decision making for a long time,'' said Eric Schmidt in announcing the decision. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.`` Larry Page credited Eric Schmidt with running the company`` brilliantly while keeping the`` headstrong founders'' involved.`` Eric Schmidt is a tremendous leader and I have learned innumerable lessons from him.
